DOC.detailed_description: We propose deliver structure multidisciplinary family-centered intervention 3-day weekend , second similar `` booster '' session 6 month later . The intervention base regional diabetes camp , Camp Sweeney . The propose camp encounter aim provide : - An opportunity intensive education beyond achievable single class , without unfavorable impact multiple weekday class family work time . - Varied educational modality include didactic session , practical demonstration role playing . - Close observation child throughout day night experience diabetes counselor medical staff identify help correct maladaptive family behavior . - A safe environment parent participate group therapy session without child care worry . - An opportunity age-appropriate child-centered educational therapeutic activity . - An opportunity family form mutually-supportive friendship . - Fun weekend away parent help care diabetic child . We conduct pilot study , enroll 18 preschool child age 3-5.5 year , goal obtain preliminary result 15 subject . The primary outcome , determine approximately one month two camp session , improvement Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) . This outcome compare historical control . Exploratory Hypotheses : Compared pretreatment baseline historical control , subject attend two 3-day session family diabetes camp improve : - HbA1c 3 month first camp session - Hypoglycemia frequency , measure continuous glucose monitoring - Medical system utilization , measure telephone call frequency also emergency room visit hospitalization - Behavioral/QoL assessment , include parent young child version hypoglycemia fear survey ( HFS-P-YC ) , Behavioral Pediatrics Feeding Assessment Scale ( BPFAS ) , general diabetes module PedsQL . - Diabetes knowledge , assess questionnaire - Development friendship subject family , assess questionnaire
